note:
Artist, long engaged in the internet and technology in the landscape, networks and remote projects. Founding member Electronic Disturbance Theater 1.0 2.0 3.0. Teaching Professor of Visual Arts, teaching mostly history of computing in the arts, and technical topics in the ICAM major at UCSD such as electronics, making, parallel compute, super computing, video walls, etc. Specialist in undergraduate education. Internet origin of leet $#!+

This is now the home of my #nft projects. See pinned.
